adjectives.description: jawfallen (comparative more jawfallen, superlative most jawfallen)

examples: He was pitifully jawfallen. As the guards jogged him out of the room he waved me a farewell.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Having a "fallen" or locked jaw (and hence sometimes unable to speak), variously attributed to dejection (the previous sense) or lockjaw.
examples: Legion is a yelping Cur, he only made a noise behind their Backs, but durst not look them in the Face. Indeed then he did make a slip, or broke his Halter, but now he's Chain'd or Jawfallen, for I han't heard of him never since.
